alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 1:13PM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Wind chills Friday morning will drop to 30-50 degrees below zero. The combination of snow, wind, and wind chills make this a dangerous situation for people and animals. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Mission Valley, Flathead Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 3 AM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds will bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
